title: (x) ABC logo - custom drawn {Hyun Auh}
content: Does anyone know what font is used in the abc logo?
author: jdkwilkins

comments.content: I think it was a custom job by Paul Rand based on Herbert Bayer's Universal Alphabet.
As we always did in the "old days", Like Paul, we just drew it.
You mean they didn't have computers back then Chris? ::gasp:: ::wink:: Yeah, I'd say custom too.
